page.title: 20CHRISTMAS AT SCHOOL
page.content: {Christmas}is a time for children and at{Easterfield Primary School}this is a very busy time. A lot of effort is put in organising the{children's party.}Pre school children are invited as well as all parents who wish to attend. A{'Santa {Claus'}is booked and presents bought for all children. On the day itself the children play such games as {'Farmer's in his Den', 'Pass the {Parcel'}and{'Musical Arms'.}For tea there are sausage rolls, biscuits, jelly and ice cream. After, Santa arrives and distributes the presents. At the end of the afternoon each child receives a balloon and apple or orange. An other important aspect of this time of year is the school {Nativity Play}which attracts many parents and shows children the real meaning of Christmas.
